idea:
Investo Ventures Pvt. Ltd. (IVPL) located at the India’s business hub Mumbai, Started its operations in 2008. The experts from IVPL can empower businesses with Backend Processing Services such as Data Entry, Lead Generation, Document Verification, Transaction Processing, Loan Processing, Trainings, Business Solutions, Credit Solutions, Etc. We have a team dedicated for each business function who works during your office and non-office hours to help ease your burden of repetitive operations. You can allocate your resources to revenue generating functions and improve the bottom-line.


IVPL's directors are having accumulated 12+ years of experience in delivering backend processing services to a variety of business across India. Our back-end executives are trained with various administrative skills including data entry and management, document scanning and verification, loan and claims processing, accounting responsibilities, analysis of situational scenarios, preparation of financial statements and reporting. Along with this our back-office team is efficient with additional soft skills for maintaining a seamless communication with the clients on a timely basis. For timely communication, our back-office executives are available through live chat, email, and call.


We have 35+ Clients (Banks) in more than 3+ Locations and these customers are from key industry verticals and niches such as Online Retail, Technology, Manufacturing, Automotive, Mortgage, Insurance, Law Firms, Real Estate, Academic Institutions, Medical and Healthcare, Finance and Accounting, Travel and Hospitality, etc. Our team delivers business values to each client because we understand clearly that our continued success is dependent on their happiness with our work. Our "customer driven" approach has provided us with a stable and sustainable business model.


Outsourcing your back-office functions to IVPL allows you and your team to concentrate on your core business activities like design and development, manufacturing, sales, and marketing efforts by being least concerned about tedious, repetitive and time-consuming business operations. We take the complete responsibility of your backend functions and adapt your business model and policies well to make sure that our service quality is in sync with your business standards.
name: INVESTO VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ilovestore is a venture of Arti Agro & Foods Pvt. Ltd. which is an An ISO 22000 : 2018 Food Safety Management Systems (FSMS) Certiﬁed Company that was established in 2001 with the vision of being world-class Super Stockists in the distribution of food products. Handling the Mumbai District with great success since then, each of our projects is spearheaded by Ms Arti Kamble whose family has been in the retail business for over 75 years.

Our venture into dry fruits, spices and staples is marked by acquiring a decade-old brand “I Love”, and that’s just another step towards excelling in the food processing and packaging industry. The experience gained over the years as Super Stockists is something that many people cannot claim to have.
name: ARTI AGRO & FOODS PVT LTD

idea: APOGEAN LLP - MANUFACTURER AND TRADER OF SPECILIAZED COMPUTERS , COMPUTER PERIPHERALS AND COMPUTER  COMPONENTS.
